text: Bernd Cullmann (11 October 1939 – 13 January 2025) was a West German sprinter. He won a gold medal in 4×100 m relay at the 1960 Summer Olympics.Athletics at the 1960 Roma Summer Games: Men's 4 × 100 metres Relay. sports-reference.com Cullmann died on 13 January 2025, at the age of 85.Handwerk trauert um Olympiasieger und Edelsteinschleifermeister Bernd Cullmann (in German). title: Bernd Cullmann
